fullDescription.intro:
Allows processing an arbitrary input table by means of a Python snippet. First the input is transferred to a Python session. Next the script is executed, and finally the data is read back from the Python session into a Knime-table.
Make sure that KNIME has access to a local or remote Python installation (KNIME->Preferences)
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki

ports.inPort: The data which Python should process
ports.outPort: The results of the Python-snippet converted back into table.
